name: RUSS FOUNDATION
briefDescription: RUSS FOUNDATION is a charity, registered as a non-profit organization under the Tamilnadu Societies Registration Act in India. Since its inception in the year 1992, it has developed into a dynamic organization with a history of bringing vital changes in the community. Russ Foundation concentrates its developmental efforts at grass-root level in the areas sectors like Health, HIV/AIDS, Education, Socio-economic development, Life-skill Vocational Training and Ecology. Russ Foundation is focused to create sustainable and culturally relevant solutions by enabling communities to break the longstanding obstacles for their development.  The primary object of Russ Foundation is to improve the quality of life of the children.
